sentences.sContent: Many retired British people are now resident in Spain.
sentences.sCn: 许多退休的英国人现在住在西班牙。

sentences.sContent: A resident said, "I think we should write it down on paper or tell our family members.
sentences.sCn: 一位居民说：“我觉得我们应该把遗嘱写在纸上或者告诉给自己的家人。

sentences.sContent: ...And involving the future resident in the process can be very important...
...How a resident feels depends on an interaction between themselves and the care facility they live in...

trans.tranOther: someone who lives or stays in a particular place
